mapper.select: SELECT profile_image FROM user WHERE user_id = #{userId}
SELECT nickname FROM user WHERE user_id = #{userId}

SELECT u.user_id, u.nickname, u.is_premium, u.profile_image, u.bio, u.nationality, u.travel_style_id, ts.label AS travelStyleLabel FROM user u LEFT JOIN travel_style ts ON ts.id = u.travel_style_id WHERE u.travel_style_id = (SELECT travel_style_id from user WHERE user_id = #{userId}) AND u.user_id != #{userId} AND u.user_status = 'ACTIVE' AND u.role = 'ROLE_USER' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM follow f WHERE f.follower_id = #{userId} AND f.following_id = u.user_id ) ORDER BY u.created_at DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT u.user_id, u.nickname, u.is_premium, u.profile_image, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM follow WHERE follower_id=u.user_id) AS followingCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM follow WHERE following_id=u.user_id) AS followerCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM country_visit WHERE user_id=u.user_id) AS countryVisitCount FROM user u WHERE ((u.user_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')) OR (u.nickname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%'))) AND u.user_status = 'ACTIVE' AND u.role = 'ROLE_USER' LIMIT #{limit}
